title: Blade of Oppressed Souls
content:
Blade of Oppressed Souls Rare 3~15 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing+1d4Psychic Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Fragments of dead souls are imprisoned in the steel. Angry, powerful, hopeful, or scared - all of them rose up against their illithid masters, and all of them fell to this blade. Now, they are trapped forever, forced to aid their oppressors.
